posts.post_content:
I need very low grade unslabbed copies of Cobb, Johnson, and Wilhelm to finish my basic t205 set.  Skinned copies are ok as long as intact. Prefer trade as am on a limited budget but will buy if price is within my range.  Below is my trade list

[url]https://sites.google.com/site/prewartradelist/[/url]

Thanks

John
